name: Cthulhu Call of void
description:
Cthulhu Call of void is a student project. It is not finished, not published, and not currently in production. We give you access to a playable build we used as an alpha/proof of concept.
Be aware that the game you are about to play may contain bugs, glitches, unwanted behaviors...

---

Cthulhu Call of void is a first-person adventure video game, in which we play as an investigator exploring a mansion. 

You have to resolve enigmas and puzzles in order to solve strange events.
